problem.markdown:
>>How about if you change the span of the arch instead? What happens to the compressive force as the span increases?<<
(x) the compressive force, C, increases ( ) the compressive force, C, decreases ( ) the compressive force, C, remains the same
[explanation] Explanation: As the span increases the compressive force (C) in the arch also increases. The closer you are to horizontal the higher the forces. [explanation]
